 <<Cyndro focused his firepower on the attackers. Three missiles 
launched out at Sixshot, and three at Ares, followed by alot of plasma shots 
at both. He also fired four missiles at Imprisoner.>>

An aiming ten missiles shot from one of Jen's characters...utterly amazing.  
Also, the fact that only a few of my shots that I fired upon her hit only a 
single character :)

Resisting urge to fight fire with fire.
